name: Stock Technical Analysis
description: Fetches historical stock data from Tiingo and calculates basic technical indicators (SMA, RSI, MACD, ATR, etc.), then returns a structured analysis of the trend.
author: Shinkai

tiingo_api_key.description: Your Tiingo API key. If not provided, we will check the TIINGO_API_KEY environment variable.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch data for.

lookback_days.description: How many days of historical data to fetch.

analysis.description: Contains various technical analysis indicators and booleans describing the trend.
